# Proposal

## Problem

What gap or ambiguity should be addressed.

## Proposed Change

Describe the proposed contract/doc change.

## Normative Impact

- Will this touch `*.json` or `*.h`?
- If yes, explain versioning intent (`MAJOR`/`MINOR`/`PATCH`).

## Compatibility Impact

Expected effect on consumers (core/cli/ui).

## Alternatives Considered

List alternatives and why they were not chosen.
